mapper.sql: ID, USER_REALNAME, USER_LOGIN_NAME, USER_LOGIN_PASSWORD, USER_TYPE, USER_COMPANY_ID, IS_ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATETIME
mapper.select:
select
from user_baseinfo where 1=1
AND (COMPANY_ID like CONCAT('%',#{searchObject},'%') or COMPANY_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchObject},'%'))
AND USER_REALNAME like CONCAT('%',#{userRealname},'%')
AND USER_TYPE = #{userType}
mapper.insert:
insert into user_baseinfo
ID,
USER_REALNAME,
USER_LOGIN_NAME,
USER_LOGIN_PASSWORD,
USER_TYPE,
USER_COMPANY_ID,
IS_ENABLED,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATETIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userLoginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userCompanyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user_baseinfo
USER_REALNAME = #{userRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_LOGIN_NAME = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{userLoginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_COMPANY_ID = #{userCompanyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_baseinfo set USER_REALNAME = #{userRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_LOGIN_NAME = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{userLoginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_COMPANY_ID = #{userCompanyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
